name: accessibility_turnOff
description: This function is used to turn off the accessibility feature of SmartThings devices using speech.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to turn off the accessibility feature.

parameters.name: predefinedAccessibilityMenu
parameters.description: The predefined accessibility menu option to turn off.
